name: Ballgame (Dragonplayer62)
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

ESC - Quit game

Very simple game where you maneuver a ball through a few levels.

This project made me realize how much I dislike level creation. I was pretty much about to just rip off Super Monkey Ball levels, so I thought I'd rather call it quits and upload something playable.

Made in UE4. 

Doesn't have an options menu, but you can change the GameUserSettings.ini file in Ballgame/Saved/Config/WindowsNoEditor
